text: Which of the following is NOT true
answers: Arrays can hold multiple types of values.

text: Which of the following is a proper array declaration
The following code is a valid way of setting a value in an array
What will the following code return
code:
int[] myArray = new int[5];
return int[5];

text: What will the following code return
code:

return int[4];
